title.narrative: (2021/22 EIPP) Policy development for solar energy industry and establishment of ESS utilization plan for electric power stabilization in Uzbekistan

description.narrative:
(Output) - Analysis of solar energy industry value chain and policy improvement to vitalize the industry in Uzbekistan - ESS utilization plans and 3 ESS pilot project proposals
(Purpose) - Providing detailed policy recommendations to vitalize the solar industry in Uzbekistan, following the round 1 EIPP solar energy project - Establishing ground for the future ESS construction projects by providing ESS utilization plan and pilot projects with the increasing need to stabilize power system in Uzbekistan

participating-org.narrative: The Export-Import Bank of Korea(Economic Development Cooperation Fund)

sector.narrative: Energy sector policy, planning and administration
